vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.36
§ Jeshohaiah = "Jehovah humbles"
a descendant of Shimei and a chief of the Simeonites
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約朔海 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華使人謙卑"
西緬的後裔 (代上 4:36)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约朔海 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华使人谦卑"
西缅的后裔 (代上 4:36)
